channel.title: businesswithcents
channel.description: This is a show based on a business philosophy that a successful business can be created and successful without a large sum of start up money. It is about an aspiring entrepreneur who is creating a business with change collected in an ordinary piggy bank. You will be able to follow along with every decision made and every penny spent starting from naming the business, getting a busines license, writing business plans, and making sales calls.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: Anthony LeGree
channel.itunes:summary: This is a show based on a business philosophy that a successful business can be created and successful without a large sum of start up money. It is about an aspiring entrepreneur who is creating a business with change collected in an ordinary piggy bank. You will be able to follow along with every decision made and every penny spent starting from naming the business, getting a busines license, writing business plans, and making sales calls.

item.title: Businesswithcents

item.title: businesswithcents
item.description: This show discusses the continuation of hard work put into the website www.bassetcomm.com and also the creative aspect of the card line. The days are counting down to October 31st and the deadline for the launch of the business and website. Witness the challenges that occur and the steps taken to overcome them to reach the determined goals and deadlines.
item.dc:creator: Anthony LeGree
item.itunes:summary: This show discusses the continuation of hard work put into the website www.bassetcomm.com and also the creative aspect of the card line. The days are counting down to October 31st and the deadline for the launch of the business and website. Witness the challenges that occur and the steps taken to overcome them to reach the determined goals and deadlines.

item.title: Businesswithcents
item.description: This week I discuss the progress on the Basset Communications website designed by Mike Sawicki, the meeting that I had with Jay Turner an artist that is going to help me launch my first set of cards, the Every Day is Saturday podcast review and lastly the preliminary package that will be sold to my first set of customers.

item.title: Businesswithcents
item.description: This show will discuss the business of Basset Communications and also includes an interview with the the Baker's Loaf Duane and Susanne. This show is based on the philosophy that it does not take a large sum of start up money to create a fun, successful and profitable business.
item.dc:creator: Anthony LeGree
item.itunes:summary: This show will discuss the business of Basset Communications and also includes an interview with the the Baker's Loaf Duane and Susanne. item.title: Businesswithcents
item.description: The show this week discusses the logo of Basset Communications, the importance of making an action plan and timeline and the release of the newsletter. The Business with Cents show tests the philosophy that it does not take a large sum of start up money to create a successful and profitable business.

item.title: businesswithcents
item.description: This show will discuss the complete and finished process of registering as an official business. It will also discuss creating a newsletter, and managing websites. The show is based on the philosophy that it is possible to create a successful and profitable business without a large sum of start up money.

item.title: Businesswithcents
item.description: This weeks episode reveals the amount of cents saved and the type of business that is going to be created. The purpose of the show is to test the business philosophy that it does not take a large amount of start up money to create a successful and profitable business.
